item.description:
Hello beauty, fashion and photo stylist members.
Our meet up photo shoot will be held next Sunday, November 21st.
Stylist and model call time is at 11:00, the photo session will take place outdoors promptly at 1:00pm

For those interested in participating, here is what is still needed:
2 models...brunette or redhead; model type -5'7" minimum height; size 2 or 4
hairstylist
manicurist
makeup artist
assistant fashion stylist

You can participate by simply attending to support your peers. Those who wish to participate and watch the photo shoot will need to arrive at 1:00pm

The photo session location will be held in downtown Boston. Exact meeting location will be disclosed to those who RSVP

group.name: Boston Beauty, Fashion and Photo Stylist

item.name: The colors of fall meetup photo session
